reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

title.narrative: Monitoring, Evaluation, Research and Learning (MERL) Technical Advisory Support

description.narrative: This Activity supports the contracting of expertise to provide support to the Insights, Monitoring and Evaluation Unit to deliver high quality Monitoring, Evaluation, Research and Learning (MERL); including the delivery of high quality fit-for-purpose MERL frameworks for country strategies, 4 Year Plans, Sectors and Themes and ensures the monitoring, evaluation and research policies, system, procedures, processes and guidelines supports the delivery of high quality MERL products.

participating-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade
New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

organisation.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

mailing-address.narrative: 195 Lambton Quay, Private Bag 18 901, Wellington 6160, New Zealand

condition.narrative: There are policy, performance and/or fiduciary conditions in contracts associated with this activity
